about_the_game:
The MXR demo contains many of the same feature and functionality as the "Venue" version except for OSC and DMX support. This demo also contains a watermark and is intended to be an intro to MXR for educational purposes.

Image curtsy of jvitorsouzadesign via Sketchfab.
detailed_description:
The MXR demo contains many of the same feature and functionality as the "Venue" version except for OSC and DMX support. This demo also contains a watermark and is intended to be an intro to MXR for educational purposes.

Image curtsy of jvitorsouzadesign via Sketchfab.
name: MXR Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Graphics: RTX 2080
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Graphics: RTX 3080

short_description: Dive into MXR for free to see what it's all about.
